She feels that her business is going well for her because she has a lot of variety of products and she serves her customers in a kind manner.

Juana is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to their support she will be able to buy merchandise for the school season, which will permit her to have a greater variety of products to offer and to increase her income and her quality of life. Thus she will continue working to accomplish her greatest dream: to help with the education of her grandchildren.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (groceries)

loans.name: Edward

texts.en:
Edward is a 40-year-old married man with school-aged children. He runs a retail and bar business, which he has operated for two years now. He got the capital to start his business by working with the Kagadi town council as a community development officer. Inadequate capital and the high prices of commodities are factors affecting his business. 

Edward says he would like to educate his children and buy a car. He would also like to move his business into other markets. He therefore wants to buy sodas, beer, and sugar for sale.

loans.use: to buy sodas, beer, and sugar for sale.

loans.name: Belky Marisela

texts.es:
La señora Belky, se dedica a su negocio de Venta de Variedad de Productos para el cuidado personal como ser, shampoo, jabón, desodorantes, cremas, lociones, perfumes, entre otros, la mayoría de sus ventas son por encargo ya que también vende por catalogo, es una joven muy emprendedora que disfruta mucho lo que hace, este negocio lo comenzó hace 02 años. Esta casada y tiene un niño, tambien realiza trabajos de Enfermeria en un hospital de la ciudad donde vive.

Esta solicitando crédito por la cantidad de L. 10,000.00, para la compra de mercadería y variedad de productos para poder ofrecer  sus clientes, espera que Prisma pueda apoyarle para hacer crecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Belky works at her business selling a variety of personal care products such as shampoo, soap, deodorant, cream, lotion, and perfume, among others. The majority of her sales are by order since they are also sold in a catalog. She is a very enterprising young woman who very much enjoys what she does. She began this business two years ago. She is married and has a son, and she also works in nursing in a hospital in the city where she lives.

She is requesting a loan of L.10,000 to buy merchandise and a variety of products to be able to offer them to her customers. She hopes that Prisma can support her in order to make her business grow.

loans.use: to buy products for her business.

loans.name: Luz Gladys

texts.es:
Luz tiene 37 años de edad es soltera y tiene 3 hijos menores de edad, cuenta con casa propia en la que vive y esta ubicada en un caserío rural del distrito de Morrope, el cual pertenece a la Provincia de Lambayeque, es un caserío pequeño de aproximadamente de 100 familias quienes se dedican a la ganadería, agricultura y artesanía en su mayoría.

Su actividad comercial de Luz es dedicarse a la crianza, engorde y posterior comercialización de animales como ganado ovino, caprino y aves de corral en su mayoría, para lo que tiene espacios estratégicos en la parte posterior de su domicilio para la crianza de los mismos hasta que alcen su peso ideal y tamaño para su venta, negocio al cual se viene dedicando ya un gran tiempo atrás ya que esto ha sido el sustento de su familia.

Ella se ha conocida ya por los pobladores de su caserío por ser una mujer trabajadora para sacar adelante a sus tres hijos y mejorarles las condiciones de vida y darles una mejor atención, y es sus ganas de seguir creciendo comercialmente que la lleva a solicitar un crédito en Edpyme Alternativa por un monto de 2000 Nuevos Soles los que invertirá en la compra de alimentos balanceados para ganado y de esa manera ofrecerlos a mejores precios.
texts.en:
Luz is 37 years old, single, and has three young children. She lives in her own home in a rural village located in the District of Morrope, which is part of Lambayeque Province. This small village has approximately 100 families who engage mostly in livestock breeding, agriculture, and craft work.

Luz has a business that involves raising, fattening, and selling animals such as sheep, goats, and poultry in bulk. She has strategic spaces behind her house where she raises these animals until they reach the ideal weight and size for resale. Luz has been in business for a long time and it has enabled her to support her family.

She is known among the residents of her village for being a hardworking woman who wants to help her three children get ahead and provide for their living conditions in the best way possible. Luz also wants to continue growing as a businesswoman, so she is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 2000 PEN. She will invest in the purchase of balanced feed for her livestock so that she can offer them at the best prices.

loans.use: to buy balanced animal feed.

loans.name: Virgilio

texts.es:
El señor Virgilio, se dedica a su pequeño negocio de venta de refrescos, jugos, churros, dulces, galletas, su negocio tiene 15 años de estar funcionando, disfruta mucho lo que hace porque este es su medio de subsistencia y es muy visitado por su vecinos, las ventas las realiza todos los días de la semana a partir de las 6:00 am hasta las 9:00pm. Las compras las realiza en un mercado de la comunidad.

Esta solicitando crédito por la cantidad de L. 5,000.00, para poder invertirlo en el negocio y ofrecer mas variedad a sus clientes y obtener mayores ingresos, su sueño es  poder hacer mas grande su negocio.
texts.en:
Virgilio works in his small business selling soft drinks, juice, churros, candies and cookies.  He has been running his business for 15 years.  He really enjoys what he does because it is how he supports himself.  His business is very popular with his neighbors.  He makes his sales every day of the week, from 6.00am to 9.00pm.  He makes his purchases in a market in his community.

Virgilio is requesting a loan for 5,000 lempiras to invest in his business, so that he can offer a greater variety of products to his customers and make more income.  His dream is to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy products for his business

loans.name: Nery Jacquelina

texts.es: Nery es una mujer de 28 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su tienda y bazar su historia empezó desde hace mas de 4 años pusieron una tienda porque ahí no había donde comprar, su trabajo lo hace sola abre desde las 6:00 hasta las 22:00, no tiene dificultades, está casada su esposo trabaja en taxi amigo, si tiene2 hijas, su sueño más importante es hacer su casa de cemento y poner una despensa completa. Por eso quiere el préstamo para su tienda.
texts.en: Nery is a 28 year old woman and has many aspirations in the coming years of prospering with her store and bazaar. Her story began more than 4 years ago. They started a store because there there wasn't anywhere to shop. She does her work alone from 6:00 in the morning until 10:00 at night. She doesn't have difficulties. She is married. Her husband works driving a taxi. She has 2 daughters. Her most important dream is making her house of cement and putting in a full store. She wants the loan for her store.

loans.use: to purchase rice, oil, and sugar.

loans.name: Leonard

texts.en:
Leonard is 37 years old  and has five children.  He is a resident of Kagadi.  He runs a produce business, which he has been doing for six years.  He started as a builder, then switched to carpentry where he  got capital and engaged in the produce business. 

From this business, Leonard has acquired capital to start a new school which he wants to boost.  Inadequate capital is affecting the growth of the school. Therefore, Leonard is requesting a loan to buy furniture for the newly established school.  He would like to educate his five children and build a permanent house.

loans.use: to buy furniture for the newly established school.

loans.name: Luisa Maria

texts.es:
Luisa es una mujer de 43 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su venta de comida. 

su historia comenzó cuando comenzó con la venta de bolos (helados en fundas) en su casa y como tuvo la oportunidad de trabajar en la playa, trabaja con su esposo de las 9.00AM hasta las 4:00PM con granizado y 6:00PM hasta las 9:00PM los jueves, si tiene dificultades la falta de turistas, si está casada, si tiene 3 hijos de 10, 12, 14 solo 2 están en la escuela.

Su sueño es establecerse bien su negocio. Por eso quiere ella el préstamo para arreglar su carrito de granizados "helados de hielo" comprando con el prestamo llantas para el carrito.
texts.en:
Luisa is 43 years old and she has big aspirations for the coming years to make her food selling business prosper.

Her story started when she began selling bolos (ice cream in plastic bags) from her house. She had the opportunity to work at the beach. She works with her husband from 9:00AM until 4:00PM selling flavored shaved ice cones and from 6:00PM to 9:00PM on Thursdays. If she has any difficulties, it is the lack of tourists. She is married. She has 3 children who are 10, 12, and 14. Only 2 of them are in school.

Her dream is to establish her business well. This is why she wants the loan, to fix her shaved ice (“ice ice-cream”)cart. She will use the loan to buy tires for the cart.

loans.use: to buy tires for her shaved ice cart.
